original_text: When all the people were now living in their towns, they went to meet together in Jerusalem. It was the seventh month of the year.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 각자의 성읍에 살았더니 일곱째 달에 이르러 일제히 예루살렘에 모인지라

sentences.original_text: When all the people were now living in their towns
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성이 이제 그들의 성읍에 거주할 때

sentences.original_text: they went to meet together in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예루살렘에서 함께 만나기 위해 갔다

sentences.original_text: It was the seventh month of the year
